other_tests.findings: Chronic inflammation with multinucleated giant cells; diagnosis of chronic inflammatory nodule with foreign body reaction.
Intense inflammatory vasculitis surrounding vessels and multinucleated giant cells compatible with granulomatous vasculitis.
Pleocytosis (WBC count, 162 cells/mm3; 65% neutrophils) and abnormal EEG findings with focal changes in the left temporal lobe.
Acute suppurative and necrotizing inflammation and structures consistent with amoebas.
Initial titer of 1:128 for Balamuthia antibody.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Later titers were 1:64 (approximately day 260) and 1:32 (after âˆ¼5 years).
